contentrichtext.text: '''Lies''' may refer to: * [[Lie]], an untruthful statement * [[Lies (evidence)]], in common law {{TOC right}} ==Music== ===Albums=== * [[Lies (Bon Voyage album)|''Lies'' (Bon Voyage album)]] * [[Lies (Krabathor album)|''Lies'' (Krabathor album)]] * ''[[G N' R Lies]]'' or simply ''Lies'', an album by Guns N' Roses ===Songs=== * [[Lies (1931 song)|"Lies" (1931 song)]], by Harry Barris and George E. Springer * [[Lies (En Vogue song)|"Lies" (En Vogue song)]] * [[Lies (Kumi Koda song)|"Lies" (Kumi Koda song)]] * [[Lies (McFly song)|"Lies" (McFly song)]] * [[Lies (The Rolling Stones song)|"Lies" (The Rolling Stones song)]] * [[Lies (Thompson Twins song)|"Lies" (Thompson Twins song)]] * "Lies", by Alphaville from ''[[Forever Young (Alphaville album)|Forever Young]]'' * "Lies", by [[Big Bang (Korean band)|Big Bang]] * "Lies", by Billy Talent from ''[[Billy Talent (album)|Billy Talent]]'' * "Lies", by The Black Keys from ''[[Attack & Release]]'' * "Lies", by The Click Five from ''[[Greetings from Imrie House]]'' * "Lies", by Elton John from ''[[Made in England (Elton John album)|Made in England]]'' * "Lies", by EMF from ''[[Schubert Dip]]'' * "Lies", by Evanescence from ''[[Origin (Evanescence album)|Origin]]'' * "Lies", by [[Fenech-Soler]] * "Lies", by J. J. Cale from ''[[Really]]'' * "Lies", by [[Jonathan Butler]] * "Lies", by [[The Knickerbockers]] * "Lies", by Korn from ''[[Korn (album)|Korn]]'' * "Lies", by Linda Ronstadt from ''[[Get Closer (Linda Ronstadt album)|Get Closer]]'' * "Lies (Through the 80s)", by Manfred Mann's Earth Band from ''[[Chance (album)|Chance]]'' * "Lies", by [[Marina and the Diamonds]] from ''[[Electra Heart]]'' * "Lies", by MC Magic from ''[[Magic City (MC Magic album)|Magic City]]'' * "Lies", by Nancy Sinatra from ''[[Boots (album)|Boots]]'' * "Lies", by Pet Shop Boys, a B-side of the single "[[You Only Tell Me You Love Me When You're Drunk]]" * "Lies", by Roxette from ''[[Crash! Boom! Bang!]]'' * "Lies", by The Saturdays from ''[[Chasing Lights]]'' * "Lies", by Stabbing Westward from ''[[Ungod]]'' * "Lies", by Stan Rogers from ''[[Northwest Passage (album)|Northwest Passage]]'' * "Lies", by Starbreaker from ''[[Starbreaker (album)|Starbreaker]]'' * "Lies", by Status Quo from ''[[Just Supposin']]'' * "Lies", by [[T-ara]] * "Lies", by The Waifs from ''[[Sink or Swim (The Waifs album)|Sink or Swim]]'' * "Lies", by Wild Orchid from ''[[Fire (Wild Orchid album)|Fire]]'' * "[[Lies (BURNS song)|Lies]]", by BURNS [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qaxE67n5-eU] ==Other media== * [[Lies (film)|''Lies'' (film)]] (''Gojitmal''), a 1999 South Korean film * [[Lies (1985 film)|''Lies'' (1985 film)]], a thriller written and directed by [[Ken Wheat]] * [[Lies (2008 film)|''Lies'' (2008 film)]], a Swedish short film directed by [[Jonas Odell]] * "Lies", an [[List of The Black Donnellys episodes|episode of the TV series ''The Black Donnellys'']] * ''[[Lies and the Lying Liars Who Tell Them: A Fair and Balanced Look at the Right]]'' or simply ''Lies'', a book by Al Franken * ''Lies'', the third book of Michael Grant's [[Gone (series)|''Gone'' series]]. * Even More Lies and the Lying Liars Who Tell Them [http://odriscollblog.blogspot.ch/p/lies-and-lying-liars-who-tell-them.html] ==Places== * [[Lies, Hautes-Pyrénées]], a commune of Hautes-Pyrénées ''département'', France * [[Lies, Friesland]], a village in the Netherlands * [[Lies, North Brabant]], a village in the Netherlands ==See also== * [[Lie (disambiguation)]] * [[Liar (disambiguation)]] * [[Lyse (disambiguation)]] * [[White Lies (disambiguation)]] {{Disambiguation}}
